contentList.content: Circle of the Blighted

Twisted by their connection to an unhallowed territory, these Druids come to exalt the natural process of decay and using it to further their goals—or sometimes to seek a means to end the curse that plagues them.
Defile Ground

You can corrupt a patch of land, which becomes <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag> for enemies. When a creature in the area takes damage from an attack or spell for the first time on a turn, it takes an extra [1].
The radius of the defiled ground and the extra damage increases at higher levels.

Corrupt a patch of land, which becomes <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag> for enemies. When a creature in the area takes damage from an attack or spell for the first time on a turn, it takes an extra [1].
Defile Ground Aura
Defiled Ground: Difficult Terrain Immunity
An ally of the Druid doesn't have its movement impeded by the defiled ground.
Defiled Ground
Standing on defiled ground. Takes an extra [1] from the first attack or spell that hits it each turn.
On Defiled Ground
Blighted Shape

Your physical form begins to show effects of the corruption you wield, granting you <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in the <LSTag Tooltip="Intimidation">Intimidation</LSTag> skill. Additionally, the corruption protects you from harm while you are transformed by your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_WildShape">Wild Shape</LSTag> feature, increasing your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 2. Your beast form also gains increased <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Darkvision">Darkvision</LSTag> to a distance of [1].
Let your physical form show the effects of the corruption you wield.
This effect can only be toggled on and off when in a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_WildShape">Wild Shape</LSTag>.
Your physical form shows the effects of the corruption you wield.
Requires you to be transformed by your Wild Shape feature.
Call of the Shadowseeds

Summon the feral children of the forest using the life force of your enemies. When a creature takes damage within the area of your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DefileGround">Defile Ground</LSTag>, you can summon a Blighted Sapling in an unoccupied space within [1] of the creature.
You can direct the Sapling to immediately make a melee attack as a part of the Reaction.

The Blighted Sapling uses its summoner's <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spell Attack Modifier</LSTag> for its attack rolls and inherits their <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>, which determines the Sapling's <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> and attack damage. Its health equals twice the Druid's level.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Cannot be cast on Undead and Constructs.
When you reach 14th level in this class, the Blighted Sapling can make two attacks.
When a creature affected by your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DefileGround">Defile Ground</LSTag> is damaged the first time each round, you may summon a Blighted Sapling next to the target.
Call of the Shadowseeds Bonuses
Sapling Stab
Stab the target with gnarly branches.
Blighted Sapling: Multiattack
Can make two claw attacks.
Foul Conjuration

The creatures you conjure are malformed and bloated with toxins. Any Beast, Fey, or Plant summoned by you is <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to Necrotic and Poison damage, and cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag>. Furthermore, when the creature dies, it explodes in a burst of toxic mulch or fetid viscera, dealing a number of d6s of Necrotic damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
You may also cause a summoned creature to explode, immediately killing it.
Blighted Resilience
This creature is bloated with toxins. Has <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Necrotic and Poison damage, and cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag>.
Toxic Demise

When this creature is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes in a burst of toxic mulch or fetid viscera. Each creature within [1] of the exploding creature takes a number of d6s of Necrotic damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.

Cause a creature summoned by you to explode in a burst of toxic mulch or fetid viscera, dealing a number of d6s of Necrotic damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to all nearby creatures.
Explode in a burst of toxic mulch or fetid viscera, dealing a number of d6s of Necrotic damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to all nearby creatures.
Incarnation of Corruption

Your physical form begins to take on the tainted traits of the land to which you are bonded, granting you <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Necrotic damage and a +2 bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>. Additionally, whenever you start your turn within the radius of the corruption created by your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DefileGround">Defile Ground</LSTag> feature, you may gain <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
Let your physical form show the tainted traits of the land to which you are bonded.
Defile Ground: Temporary Hit Points

When you start your turn within the radius of the corruption created by your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DefileGround">Defile Ground</LSTag> feature, you may gain <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
You can hide your corruption by toggling this feature off.
You have allowed the tainted traits of the land to which you are bonded to come into view.
Blighted Sapling
Shadowseeds
Small seeds made out of the condensed blight coursing through your body. Used to summon Blighted Saplings.
Shadowseeded
Has taken damage while standing on <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DefileGround">Defiled Ground</LSTag>. Can be targeted by the Druid to summon a Blighted Sapling.
Call of the Shadowseeds: Blighted Sapling Attack
Direct the Blighted Sapling to make a free attack.
You may direct the Blighted Sapling to make a free attack.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Only available immediately after the Blighted Sapling is summoned.
Blighted Sapling: Free Attack
The Sapling can immediately make a free attack.
Incarnation of Corruption: Temporary Hit Points
